title: Man Dark Skin Tone Beard
description: A man with dark skin tone and a beard. This emoji signifies a man with a specific appearance, often used for manal representation, to describe someone, or in discussions about grooming and style.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's man with beard emoji showcases a distinguished figure with a dark skin tone, rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting for a lifelike appearance. His beard is depicted with soft, rounded edges, adding to the approachable yet confident demeanor. This emoji on Apple devices is a straightforward representation of a man, often used to signify male presence, identity, or to add a personal touch to conversations.
